articles.content: Pep Guardiola's decision to defend Benjamin Mendy after the Manchester City star broke Government Covid rules by hosting a New Year's Eve party has been described as 'shameful' and 'disgraceful' by f… [+4731 chars]

articles.author: Max Winters
articles.title: Arsenal 'no longer interested in Isco because of Emile Smith Rowe's form' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Mikel Arteta was said to be very interested in bringing the Spanish international to the Emirates this month but Smith Rowe has stood out in Arsenal's three successive Premier League victories.
articles.content:
Arsenal have cooled their interest in a January move for Real Madrid's Isco because of the impressive recent form of Emile Smith Rowe, according to reports.

articles.title: Everton's January transfer focus emerges as club aim to reshape squad - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The winter window is open until February 1 and Everton are hoping to make a number of changes in January
articles.content:
Everton head into the January transfer window determined to trim their squad.
